description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Scholar and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Mystical Tome：Tap into the power of a complex tome to cast Flare, Meteor, Sleepga, or Slowga.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Scholar”
